name: Searching For Meaning: Traveling with YouTube Buddha
description:
Help Buddha navigate and meditate on their online existence with this interactive NFT. Videos in the grid include the first 1,000 videos in the search results of "Buddha" on YouTube. The sound is a 30min composition that explores the collection, searching for the meaning of "Buddha".

This project is built with web.gl, it may take a second to load on the GPU and start playing the sound.
